thread.title: Amazon Prime Members: FREE Same-Day Delivery on $35 Orders Now Available In 30 New Cities
thread.title_full: Amazon Prime Members: FREE Same-Day Delivery on $35 Orders Now Available In 30 New Cities

author: Jessica
title: Amazon Prime Members: FREE Same-Day Delivery on $35 Orders Now Available In 30 New Cities
text:
Now 30 More Cities qualify for Same-Day Amazon Delivery! If you’re an Amazon Prime member AND you live in one of these qualifying metro areas across the U.S. (30 cities total), you can now receive FREE Same-Day Delivery on qualifying orders over $35…and that includes Sundays! To see if your area is participating, head on over here and scroll down to enter your zip code.

Keep in mind that orders must be placed before the Same-Day Delivery order cutoff time (typically noon); orders placed after the cutoff qualify for FREE One-Day Shipping.
To learn about 13 Irresistible Perks of an Amazon Prime Membership, head HERE !
